caption.p: RNA-seq analysis showing the differentially expressed genes in yjbH::Tn and yjbI::Tn compared to that in the wild-type. (a). Genes that were significantly downregulated (<2-fold, FDR p-value <0.05). (b). Genes that were significantly upregulated (>2-fold, FDR p-value <0.05). (c). Gene Ontology term enrichment analysis. A complete list of differentially expressed genes in yjbI::Tn and yjbH::Tn compared with that of the wild-type (2 fold, FDR p-value <0.05) is shown in Supplemental Table S1 and S2
